name: You Broke the Game
description:
You Broke the Game

Something broke, and game won’t start. Go fix it now! Charming plaformer starring an adventurous moustached man.

The average play time is about 15 minutes. There're 134 coins in case you're wondering whether you collected them all.

A game by Andrej Suvorau & Oleg Klishin

Music by NeXsard

CONTROLS:
W/D or arrows to move S or down to crouch
SPACE to jump (hold it for longer jumps)!
